more than all the banknotes in possession of the public and banks (the monetary base) and the same value as the reserves. https://t.co/uT7Ai5Fq16
Why does the Central Bank maintain this very expensive policy? It is simple. He does it to avoid a run to the dollar and ... https://t.co/GyxGHnwRR5
The cost of this maneuver will be in just two years of $ 325 billion. That is why he was denounced criminally to Macri. https://t.co/uT7Ai5Fq16
In the famous cause "future dollar" the previous government is accused of "wasting public funds" to avoid a currency exchange.
But it turns out that the cost of LEBACs will be six times higher. https://t.co/uT7Ai5Fq16
Therefore, if a court says that there is a crime in the future dollar, it should necessarily be argued that there is 6 times more crime in the LEBAC case. 🤓
In the Federal Chamber, Sala II, they urged oral proceedings for the future dollar. On the other hand, in the LEBACS case, against Macri, they say that there is no crime.
The same Chamber, the same Chamber, the same judges, think the opposite according to who the accused is. https://t.co/uT7Ai5Fq16
However, well seen, these are very different cases. The maneuver with the LEBAC has all the condiments of a criminal act.
